Class Question

  • java.lang.Object
    • Question
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Question
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This is an instantiable Question class to represent the questions of a test.
    See Also:

        Parameters:
        text - the text of the test question

        a2 - the second option of the test question
        a3 - the third option of the test question
        corAns - the coerrect answer of the test question
        qid - unique identifier of the test question
